rewrite1:

For the second paragraph, adjust the Outline level to Level 5. Modify the font size to 10.5 points and select a dotted underline pattern. Also, apply a negative right indent of 2 characters.

rewrite3:
Please proceed with the following formatting changes to the specified paragraphs in the Word document:

- In the ninth paragraph, adjust the highlight color to the hexadecimal code #0000FF. Additionally, apply an underline style characterized by a heavy wave.

- Moving on to the second paragraph, alter its Outline level to Level 5. Modify the font size to 10.5 points and select a dotted underline for emphasis. Finally, configure the right indent to retract by 2 characters, creating a negative indent.
